website_summaries.verdict: The 8.9-inch Amazon Kindle Fire HD is the top low-cost large-screen tablet you can buy, but to get the best bang for your buck, go for the Wi-Fi-only version.
pros: Least expensive tablet data plan available
Amazon Prime members get lots of video and book content
cons: Speed is just okay, not great

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed, very poor battery life.
customer_reviews.text: When the first colour kindle came out I was really pleased, so this year I decided to buy 2 8.9” one each for my husband and I. They take hours to charge left on charge without using it for 8 hours and only 59% charged. 100% charge only lasts about 5 hours at the most. Really disappointed so have gone back to my old Samsung tab.
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne

customer_reviews.title: FRUSTRATED
customer_reviews.text: It keeps glitching all the time. at the moment it has switched itself off and will NOT switch on, I dont know what to do. I have had this for 2 years and although this is the first time of it switching off completly, it has on many occations made me want to throw it against the wall. Any help would be appreciated as I have all my music on there . ARRRRRHHHHHHHHH.
customer_reviews.author: Suzy Q

customer_reviews.title: Fit for Purpose
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my ageing parents as an alternative for their laptop, which was getting slower and slower. Used mainly for e-mails, Skyping relatives abroad and occasional surfing for which it has proved fit for purpose. From my perspective no longer getting daily calls regarding glitches with computer so has proved to be sufficiently user friendly for an elderly person. So far so good with no problems or shortcomings to report other than certain pictures on web not displaying but no big deal given it's main purpose and the profile of the user.
customer_reviews.author: Donald McCallum

customer_reviews.title: Reliable
customer_reviews.text: It has just packed up and I feel as though I have lost my right arm ,will definitely have another.Goodbye old friend thank you for many years of pleasure.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Andrew Woodfield

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful, Wonderful, Wonderful!!
customer_reviews.text: As you may gather from my title I am definitely a fan of the new Kindle. In some ways it's almost a dis-service to this piece of kit to call it a Kindle, don't get me wrong I also liked the original but this has so much more functionality that it's almost selling its self short!! I have not found a single thing that I don't like, everything works well, the touch screen is very responsive, the processor is fast and has coped well with every app I have used. Well done Amazon for producing an excellent product at a very reasonable price!!!
customer_reviews.author: SteveP

customer_reviews.title: thrilled
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Kindle fire 8'9 tablet, the first had to be sent back to Amazon with power up and down problems with it. However, as you would expect from Amazon, they couldn't have been more helpful, and replaced it within only a few days, and this one is just a joy to own, it does everything I could wish it to do, with failing eyesight I had given up on reading books but now as I can increase the font to a comfortable size I am just thrilled to bits to be able to read a book once more thank you amazon David Hinton
customer_reviews.author: D. Hinton

customer_reviews.title: I wanted an e reader with big memory.
customer_reviews.text: I bought 32gb as my original kindle was almost full and I didn't want to swap books on and off. Every book in one place was the goal. I wish there was just a regular kindle with 32gb as these extra features are wasted on me really. I have an andriod phone for aps and social networking and an ipod for music so no need for these features on an e reader. I read battery life is 10 hours. It's not 10 hours even just reading, it's more like 6 at the most. It also takes over 7 hours to charge. Please Amazon, make at 32gb e reader only device.
customer_reviews.author: Dizzy

customer_reviews.title: Kindle Fire 8.9
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a kindle fire to use at home in place of a laptop. Because it's so easy to use I haven't yet had to read a user guide, and that's three months from receiving it. I set it up myself and I'm a technophobe. It has become much cherished, and the most useful present I have ever had. The only downside is that it is too heavy for me to read books on in bed, so I use my basic kindle for that. I would definitely recommend getting the 8.9 size as it is great for internet use. Worth every penny, graphics are great, much easier than using a laptop. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Belinda Loughran

customer_reviews.title: Kindle fire HD 8.9"  Love it.
customer_reviews.text: I love my Kindle Fire. You can do so much with it, I am still learning, but am enjoying it. And the apps are great, so I can take it to bed and play games or watch TV or films. I was thinking of getting a Apple ipad, (I do like them) but as I have kindle reader and have account with Amazon went ahead and got a Kindle. I do have the odd time when the wifi goes off, as soon as I get near my wifi box and type the password in its on again. Glad I got this, though my husband keeps saying this is my boyfriend as I always have it with me, Ha. Yvonne
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne Broome

customer_reviews.title: The Perfect Tablet
customer_reviews.text: I was unsure about getting a tablet, and which one to choose, as I am sure many people are. This tablet has everything I need, It has very clear sound, an amazing touch screen-resolution and it has all the feature's I love. The Amazon Kindle Fire HD 8.9" is perfect for anyone - with a vast array of features, apps, books etc. anyone with an interest in technology is sure to love this. I would definitely recommend this tablet to all!
customer_reviews.author: M.S.L

customer_reviews.title: Fab tablet
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my mum who barely uses technology and hated using my old laptop I gave her. She only used it for internet banking, and sometimes online shopping. Having a kindle has completely changed everything for her. She now uses apps, reads books and reads her news online! Excellent product, I now have a (sort of) tech-savvy mum!
customer_reviews.author: Leanne

customer_reviews.title: I expected better
customer_reviews.text: I really expected more from this tablet. My last tablet was nearly a quarter of the price and although it needed restarting a lot more often, I only restart the kindle every week or so, it seemed to be a lot less frustrating. My main frustration with the kindle is that there are a lot of android apps that aren't compatable with it. It's really frustrating to constantly get the error message that something you want to download is only compatable with android when you're supposed to be using an android device!
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Bought as a gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my Mum and it's her first tablet. Didn't want to spend a fortune on it and lots of people told me a Kindle was good value and I would agree. Much cheaper than an iPad. It isn't as good as an iPad but for the price difference you wouldn't expect it to be. She is happy with it and the interface etc seems pretty straightforward and the speed is good. Occasionally the screen isn't as responsive as you might expect, which is the reason I rated it 4 stars instead of 5.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Oliver

customer_reviews.title: Great e reader mediocre tablet.
customer_reviews.text: Had this kindle 4 months now. As an e-reader it is brilliant,magazines are much more usable than on the 7 inch version. Now for the gripes. Battery life is poor less than 2days sometimes, available apps are poor, cannot use Sky Go, cannot get Skype to work properly, Google maps does not seem to work. BBC player struggles, internet is slow with frequent lockups. Music playing is frankly rubbish , get an iPhone. I will be keeping the tablet for reading , but I think a Samsung 10 inch will be my birthday present.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Berry

customer_reviews.title: Great tablet
customer_reviews.text: This tablet is perfect for my needs. Surfing the net and sending emails plus reading books. Its not an ipad and does not confess to be. I bought the smaller version originally but my wife now has that. So got the larger screen which I find is better for reading magazines I think it is brilliant for my use. In theory I can do word and spreadsheets etc but not done so as trying to not do work in it. Nearly forget - it is fabulous for catch up TV - BBC iplayer ( or live for that matter via app) David
customer_reviews.author: David Guest

customer_reviews.title: Against the IPad, get over the stigma and save yourself £200.
customer_reviews.text: I checked out the ipad the galaxy and a few others, I won't mention their names because they were shockingly bad. This gem is great, it does everything I want it to, the battery life is great, the picture and sound are fine. (lacks bass). And all the apps download quickly and work fluidly and smoothly. I was so impressed, I bought one for my partners birthday. We don't talk anymore our faces are glued to these. great value at £159 against the Ipad £350+. no brainer.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Joannides

customer_reviews.title: love my Kindle, ticks all the boxes, every penny well spent.
customer_reviews.text: Iove my Kindle,had considered buyig the ipad air but was hesitent because of the price tag it attracts, but my kindle meets all my needs, feels nice to hold, very fast perfomance, fantastic graphics and clarity, however it did shut down on me once and was un-responsive to everything I tried to do to get it up and running so I contacted the Amazon help desk and went on to live chat and they had it up and running in minutes, very impressive, would strongly reccomend to all and everyone, every penny well spent.
customer_reviews.author: david thomson

customer_reviews.title: Kindle fire HD 8.9
customer_reviews.text: This is an upgrade for my previous kindle, text to speech is an improvement for those of us with poor sight, pity the light goes out of its own accord. I tried to find a book on it but they all seemed to be Americanized. A big disappointment is the need to purchase a screensaver,which makes a lot of difference. Its a well made product. I must congratulate the help line, who talked me through my inital problems so courteously.
customer_reviews.author: cabs

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant
customer_reviews.text: I would never have believed this little tablet would have made my laptop almost redundant. I absolutely adore my kindle, it gives me endless amount of pleasure & entertainment. I'm also an amazon prime member which also allows me to watch videos or box series on my kindle. I have also purchased a cable which you plug in to your kindle then in to your television which then lets you stream all your movies/box sets, games etc straight to your BIG screen HD tv.....awesome :)
customer_reviews.author: Daz

customer_reviews.title: KINDLE FIRE
customer_reviews.text: The trouble with this very clever piece of technology is that it caters for people who want to learn about it. It does not seem to dawn on Amazon that there are people who do not like to try to remember what daft little pictures signify and would much prefer to have an instruction manual with an index so that the desired operation could be looked up and then put into operation. As it is it frequently risks being thrown through the window.
customer_reviews.author: Peter C.

customer_reviews.title: This is for Me
customer_reviews.text: I was very uncertain about getting a Kindle of any kind. After looking at reviews I ordered the Kindle Fire HD and all I can say is it is the best thing for me. I read books all the time, I am always on internet to keep in touch. But most of all I got the Kindle because we spend winter in our caravan in Spain and you can take all the books you need on your Kindle, so no bulky books to carry when weight is an issue. I've only had this Kindle for a few days but know that I made the right decision in the end. Well pleased!!. Not done music yet!!!.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Much better than expected.
customer_reviews.text: I mainly wanted a nice big tablet for reading books with images and diagrams for study purposes. I was not really after all the apps and cutting edge hardware but this tablet surprised me. I could install some of my favorite apps on here that run smoothly and discover really cool new ones. The best thing about this tablet is the screen, it's every bit has sharp as the retina iPads! For the money you just cannot beat it.
customer_reviews.author: Traffic

customer_reviews.title: ideal 'tablet'
customer_reviews.text: does everything i need to do, such as read books, send and receive emails, search the web. it does just about everything a normal tablet would do but without the 3g connection. connects well over internet and links to my phone which is used as the 3g modem. excellent for my need, good graphics and sound. pity it doesn't have an sd card slot. 16gb is a little small if you want to store a lot of movies but is ideal for storing books etc. plenty of apps available to carry out other tasks. recommended
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not sure I made the right decision
customer_reviews.text: So far it has not been easy to use instructions I found wanting you cant really do much without being near an internet connection and not much to do off line except read books but then I have a kindle to do that anyway, probably, will not use that much and will return to taking my lap top when travelling . So far have found no advantage buying this item will probably try to re sell at a loss. Lesson learned.
customer_reviews.author: Asadin

customer_reviews.title: Hmm
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my mother as a present. She was used to the 7" device and likes it, finding the silk system easy to navigate. I set it up for her and it seems an ok device, but as a user of all different tablets, have to say it is just not in the same league as the iPad Mini or the Nexus tablets. My money would be on one of those devices, IF you are new to tablets or if you are fed up of the limitations of the Fire.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: annq
customer_reviews.text: The Kindle Fire HD 8.9" is a real pleasure to use. As a beginner with tablets the guide has helped enormously and any time I got stuck I managed to find my way back to the guide, non of the panic I have had with some other devices. Books are good, music seems easy and photos look amazing. Haven't tried film, but I am not a great film fan except maybe for old ones, like me! Still pottering my way around.
customer_reviews.author: rosaline a quinney

customer_reviews.title: kindle fire hd
customer_reviews.text: once l had managed to register, for which l had to get someone to help me, if you don't fully understand computer language which a lot of us don't you are not sure what is required, all was fine. cannot read books in sunlight but no doubt there is something to help with that. otherwise it is so handy to check e mails without switching on the computer and they are there instantly, even better. book reading indoors is very easy and the screen is very restful.
customer_reviews.author: calendular

customer_reviews.title: Present
customer_reviews.text: This was a present for my dad for christmas. I got it because I have kindle reader and I absolutely love it, I use it day in day out however the kindle fire was a bit of a let down. I would say it is not as easier to navigate (for old people) as a tablet such as iPad and there is a lack of apps such as maps and videos can only be mp4 format.
customer_reviews.author: barbie

customer_reviews.title: This Fire doesn't set me aflame..
customer_reviews.text: Not as user friendly as other Fire models, screen quality kind of hazy too. Plus for some reason small dots have appeared on the screen as if a tiny pixie has stomped across it... and they don't go away, not good, not good at all. A screen protector makes no difference. Rather disappointed. My mum has lighter, smaller Fire model and it's excellent, not as much hassle finding apps for say Twitter and facebook, either. This is pricier but ...
customer_reviews.author: Janarchy

customer_reviews.title: Much better options on the market for around the same price
customer_reviews.text: The screen resolution and sound are awesome, but the carousel is awful, the keyboard is sluggish, battery life when watching streaming video is about 4 hours and when they recommend that you don't let your device drop below 40% this is not ideal. Silk, the built in browser is the worst I have ever used, you can download chrome but not from Amazon, and finally you cannot use YouTube, it is not supported and there is no alternative. Honestly, they would need to do a lot for me to recommend a kindle. You party for it but Amazon dictate what you can do with it, it's like the big brother of tablets basically.
customer_reviews.author: McG

customer_reviews.title: Delighted with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: Bought at a bargain price. I had already owned the standard 7" Kindle for over a year and wanted a bigger screen and HD with stereo. I like the Kindle and its market and have used Amazon video since becoming a Prime member on this device. The brand gives you confidence as support is fast and, in my experience, better than anything else offered. I expect the Kindle to continue to deliver and develop.
customer_reviews.author: Jobic

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this
customer_reviews.text: I have had my Fire HD 8.9 for around 2 years and its great for reading, listening to music and watching movies etc. Its internet browsing is a different story though. It constantly freezes and can't be used until I hold down the power button for 20 seconds to reset it. I often feel like throwing it out the window. Amazon can't fix this. I would not recommend this kindle at all.
customer_reviews.author: Caro R

customer_reviews.title: kindle ..on fire
customer_reviews.text: Love it, have used a friend's iPad and to be honest I don't see lot of difference for what I use it for. Picture quality is fantastic, it responds really well and the keyboard has big enough keys for the most sausage like fingers. Only complaint I have and its minor, is they don't have candy crush saga and what they do have really just isn't the same . I would would certainly recommend it to family, friend's and anyone else who asks : ))
customer_reviews.author: valeymac

customer_reviews.title: The jock gets a Kindle Fire HD
customer_reviews.text: OK it looks and feels impressive, reading from it is easy. Having trouble with the Lovefilms 30 day free trial, it did not happen. Unfortunatly I went on holiday the week I got it so I had no time to figure it out. I am now back at work in Nigeria with limited internet access so I still see me not getting it sorted till I get home (28 days time). Still getting the hang of its navigation processes, I keep thinking its my Asus net book.
customer_reviews.author: The Jock

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTIC
customer_reviews.text: I just love the Kindle Fire HD 8.9" I have used it constant since I purchased it. I have read and purchased books from amazon to read on my kindle and it is great. This is the first of this type I have purchased and I would not change it. I have not tried everything but it will be interesting to try. The size is excellent as the 7" would have been too small for me. The light helps me read and does not disturb anyone
customer_reviews.author: MASTERMAN

customer_reviews.title: Good tablet
customer_reviews.text: Excellent tablet. Works well and the clarity is fab! Had a few problems to start with, kindle would freeze and cause apps to crash. At one point the whole kindle crashed and not knowing how to restart the tablet I spent several minutes trying to figure out what to do. Since looking at reviews on how to increase the kindles performance it has worked and performed a lot better. It still has moments where it will crash and the screen will go black and won't respond. But overall it's a good product and enjoy it very much.
customer_reviews.author: Tabbie

customer_reviews.title: Kindle Fire for 78 year old Mum
customer_reviews.text: Delivery was very quick, even though close to Christmas. Very easy to get started and for me to set up for her, she loves the carousel idea as she can return there easily if she gets confused. I have set up the parental lock so she can't buy things by accident. Quality of the screen and sound is excellent, she was able to watch TV/Films, read books, browse the internet, and look at photographs within hours of getting it. We bought the case and stand which made it easier to watch and use, and were glad that we went for the larger screen and HD Would recommend to anyone, and plan to buy one myself.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Jane A Evison

customer_reviews.title: My First !!
customer_reviews.text: Haven't had my Kindle very long. Still getting used to it. But love the Dolby sound. Have it in a case, which makes it a bit heavier, but something like this needs protection. Also being a glass screen it will save it from being scratched. Size is good. Not too big, not too small. Lovely for recipe books. As I am still exploring and finding new things, I find the whole experience exciting. Many Thanks Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Elizabeth Brown

customer_reviews.title: Fab u lus !!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is my fourth Kindle and I have to say I love love love it.!! Of course it's a little heavier, it is a little bigger. Once you get used to the weight increase its fine. The only reason I have not given it 5 stars is because I don't believe that the sound quality is as good as it is on the smaller K.F HD. Everybody that likes to read and listen to music at the same time should have a Kindle.
customer_reviews.author: JeanetteDL

customer_reviews.title: Kindle Fire HD 8.9
customer_reviews.text: What can I say - I just don't know what I did before I bought it. Most people use it just for reading - but I use it for EVERYTHING. Browsing the net - E-Mails - pictures - Videos - TV - you name it - the list just goes on. The only small downside is that the Kindle can become heavy if you are holding it for a while - you definitely need the cover as a stand
customer_reviews.author: Chas

customer_reviews.title: Product is a million years behind IPAD.
customer_reviews.text: Nothing to do with seller but this Kindle tablet is merely a front of store for Shopping. It restricts use of apps unless you leave it open for your kids to buy all round them as your account details are held in the tablets setup. Very disappointed with the kit. Tried to save a few quid and buy this instead of apple product but should have gone the extra few pounds and bought an iPad mini. Recommend to avoid this kit and save for a few more months and get an apple ipad.
customer_reviews.author: Dathlete

customer_reviews.title: kindle fire hd 8.9 32 gb
customer_reviews.text: I bought the bigger kindle because my son got one for my granddaughter and I liked the size of it.At the time I already had my smaller fire hd.glad I still have it instead of giving it to my grandson. As I keep going back to it the other one tends to shut off while I am using it. I like it for its size.not sure if it's just me or what.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Dean

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant
customer_reviews.text: This is my 4th Kindle, each time upgrading and passing the previous ones to my husband, daughter etc. All off which continue to work great. i am a big fan of Kindles. I like the instant access to Amazon. I love how any Cds purchased on Amazon go straight onto the Kindle to also be accessed on there. I love the new screen size of this. A big thumbs up from me.
customer_reviews.author: northern mum

customer_reviews.title: terrific kindle fire hd
customer_reviews.text: Love it love it love it!!!! I have had two kindles before this one and the fire totally surpasses those. I am really impressed with it, it does everything I want and more whilst still being brilliant for reading. Good clear screen, easy to use and navigate....Perfect for a technophobe like me. best buy I've made in a long time. I would give it six stars if I could!!!
customer_reviews.author: Brigato

customer_reviews.title: Excellent - BUT......
customer_reviews.text: This is just a fantastic bit of kit and does more than what you feel it is capable of. It is lightweight, smart, easy to operate and a stunning picture. A must for avid readers but one big BUT. Why no mains charging lead included? This has cost a star and for the price should be included NOT an optional extra. Come on Amazon sort this huge disappointment item out.
customer_reviews.author: Cider Monkey

customer_reviews.title: Better than the Fruity Alternative
customer_reviews.text: I have found this easy to use and versatile. I can read, play games, listen to music, send e-mails etc etc. I have friends who have commented on the ease of the use of it in comparison to the alternative. It may be a wi-fi not on its own dongle but it suits my needs and I find it easier and more portable than a laptop.
customer_reviews.author: titanicrose

customer_reviews.title: I love it.
customer_reviews.text: I use this at the moment more as a tablet than a kindle but have downloaded books ready for my holiday. It took some time to get used to it and I am still learning but I am a bit of a techno phobe so that's not really surprising. Still trying to get my head a round the camera as you can only take selfies. I still use the camera on my phone and upload them to this via the cloud app.
customer_reviews.author: Dotty

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good tablet, a little heavy, but easy to use and the HD is lovely. Getting into my emails is so easy compared with lugging out the laptop. Only problem I found was in charging it up - takes forever and never seems to get to 100% - but that could just be me being impatient. Not an iPad but then it's half the price
customer_reviews.author: Constance C. L. Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good bit of gadgetry
customer_reviews.text: Could do with a bit more RAM and a slightly faster processor, but it's still a tidy bit of kit. A micro SD slot would be an idea too. Apart from that, it's well made and feels (and looks) like a much more expensive tablet. Excellent value for money, as similar spec devices can be at least £50 more costly. I'd recommend the Kindle Fire HD to anyone thinking of buying a tablet device.
customer_reviews.author: Dean Woodford

customer_reviews.title: Freezing Kindle fire hd
customer_reviews.text: My kindle fire hd 8.9 keeps freezing. Very frustrating. I suspect it's a problem with the Silk browser. There is also a standard kindle fire 7" in use in the house with no problems whatever. Amazon support not helpful, just pointed me to the online help! I've checked that battery is full and Wi-Fi is full strength. Anybody else experience this problem with the kindle fire HD 8.9?
customer_reviews.author: Michael McKenna

customer_reviews.title: Very short lifespan. Fire products are known to have several common problems (according to many forums on the internet). Avoid.
customer_reviews.text: Dead after just over a year and a half of very light use and loving care, 8 months out of warranty. No fix available. Including case(s) now over £300 out of pocket. Only viable offer from Amazon was to spend another £200 on a refurbished device (not including case). Not willing to take the risk. Will avoid all Fire products in future.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Everson

customer_reviews.title: Great piece of technology
customer_reviews.text: 5 star plus so far. I am still learning about my new acquisition! Can't read in bed though as if I fall asleep and drop my"Fiera" it won't be good for it! The free books /games are super too. BUT I have yet to find out how I "bin" (delete)something.However I will persevere and will fast become an expert I am sure
customer_reviews.author: M.TYSICK

customer_reviews.title: Why Buy an IPad.
customer_reviews.text: What a great value for money buy. I am over the moon with the quality and performance of this tablet. It does every thing and more than I expected. My only disappointment was that I bought this model, just before I heard of the HDX being released. I also bought the fast charger too. I know many are not happy that it was not included but @ under half the price of an IPad I am more than happy.
customer_reviews.author: Aries17

customer_reviews.title: Kindle Fire
customer_reviews.text: I bought an original kindle for my nephew. He thought it was great. When I saw the Kindle Fire HD, I thought it was time to treat myself. It is very easy to use, Excellent picture and fast to operate. Mt granddaughters also think its very easy to use and they love the games. So do I. Worth waiting for.
customer_reviews.author: grandad

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to take advantage of Amazon Prime Instant Video (so much more catchy then "Love Film", don't you think?) and it does the job perfectly. While the wife watches Masterchef, I can stick the headphones on (Bose, of course) and wallow in a good film. Of course, it does more than that and I also use it for email and web browsing, but I use my other tablet (Google Nexus 7) for most apps. I bought this 6 weeks ago and got a case from ebay for well under a tenner.
customer_reviews.author: Statts

customer_reviews.title: Kindle Fire HD. 8.9"
customer_reviews.text: Love it, love it. My number 2 kindle but I still use both, the 7" is in my bag for when I am out and about & have time to read, the Fire is my all singing all dancing one. I enjoy reading e-books (I also like paperbacks & hardbacks), listening to audio books and playing download games. The Fire has re-ignited my interest in what can be done with technology. How can I not be happy..... Excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: Judith Waldie

customer_reviews.title: kindle fire
customer_reviews.text: This is a superb product. The internet was so easy to set up wirelessly, even for a dummy like me .And all my e-mails were on the screen in a few seconds. Down loaded a book and a few games free of charge.so simple. Great design, so smooth to use. I would recommend this Kindle to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: P. Roberts

customer_reviews.title: oops wrote the review in the cover bit
customer_reviews.text: As I said in my previous writing as a book worm I have much of my favourite books readily available to me, and especially when I travel , 12 hour boat trip frequently. Waiting for appointment that are running late etc. The only critism I have is the speach component is boring and frustrating including all the numbers and punctuation as part of the presentation it disrupts the flow of the printed information.
customer_reviews.author: Keetza

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant however, does anyone else have this problem
customer_reviews.text: I bought my Kindle Fire in March 2013 and its been brilliant, use it every day for e-mail, games, internet etc, until recently that its... over the past few weeks it is taking longer and longer to charge - 100% is a mere memory, indeed as I am writing this it has been on charge for 24 hours and is still only at 63%. Does anyone know if this is a common problem and if so how do I fix it, or is it now too old and I should think about a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Pip21honest

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, smooth performance, great for ebooks
customer_reviews.text: Mainly used for ebook reading, and as you would expect, it's excellent. As a tablet for other purposes, I don't really like the layout and how to get to apps etc, but that's just my preference. If main requirement is for a tablet, I would go for something else like nexus 7 or samsung galaxy tab. All round very happy, does exactly what it says in description. One word of warning, be careful what case you buy for it, I got one from ebay, the magnet in the case was too strong and kept triggering the kindle to power off screen as it thought the case was closed. Solution was, I removed the magnet from the case :-)
customer_reviews.author: Fintan Maher

customer_reviews.title: An excellent tablet for the money.
customer_reviews.text: The tablet is good value for money and is a reasonable performer with a first class screen. It is convenient to use, but WIFI is slow to download data compared with my 4th generation iPad and it is disappointing that it cannot handle YouTube video and Adobe. Battery life could be longer, but cannot be beaten for ebooks.
customer_reviews.author: John.S.Cole

customer_reviews.title: Kindle Fire HD
customer_reviews.text: Just finding my way around. Love the clarity of the films and books. However, whilst reading a book don't seem to be able to access the menu and so end up having to switch it off and on again. Probably just me and there is a way. Heavier than I was expecting, but with cover that allows it to be propped up it's great.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Bought another Tablet from Groupon, didn't last two minutes before it wouldn't charge any more. My colleague and I both bought the kindle on the same day, love it. Sometimes I wish I bought the 7" as easier to hold in your hand, as this one is slightly bigger and heavier, but the quality and ease of use is great, I hardly get my laptop out any more. Well worth the money, I am sure it has gone down again in price.
customer_reviews.author: Miss carol Murray

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for me
customer_reviews.text: The Kindle Fire HD 8.9" is all that I wanted it to be. I use it for email, social media, games and reading. Not having my Kindle backlit was proving inconvenient so that was my main reason for buying this. When the price dropped so significantly it was too good an opportunity to miss. If I do have a criticism, it's that the apps can randomly stop working and Skygo is not available. I can, however live with this.
customer_reviews.author: John Culleton

customer_reviews.title: I did not buy it for me but I cannot help monopolizing it
customer_reviews.text: A close relative was bought a Kindle by her "grandchildren" (aka their mother). She loved it but was/is not a natural user of the internet. And so I bought one myself to find out how it worked and teach her how to use it to discover the wonders of the Web. I am still marvelling at its capability.
customer_reviews.author: Codger

customer_reviews.title: Beware kindle may 'die' after 12 month guarantee expires
customer_reviews.text: I had this Kindle Fire for just 14 months the battery will not charge and cannot be repaired was offered refurbished Kindles but would not buy one again. I have lost my holiday photographs because the kindle will not turn on to retrieve them. I am very disappointed and think that it should have lasted longer than 14 months just two months over the guarantee period. All in all consider it a complete waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Hughes-Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Like the Xbone it's not customer-focussed, but seller-focussed. A nightmare to transfer purchases from your other kindle.
customer_reviews.text: If you already have a kindle don't bother getting this - it was a nightmare transferring my other purchases from my broken kindle to this. I had to get an IT bloke to set up my office email. Furthermore, the UI is confusing. User-friendly and customer service are obviously only phrases to them.
customer_reviews.author: Martin Gilloway

customer_reviews.title: Camera
customer_reviews.text: I chose this Kindle to get the camera and found that it only a 1 way camera. The picture is awful and the colours are almost black and white. I wasted my time re-ordering a Kindle Fire HD.8.9. I should have bought an IPad instead.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Just a shame about the amazon branding
customer_reviews.text: This is a good quality tablet. Only thing missing is a rear facing camera really. I don't get on with the way Amazon mangle android, but there are ways around that if you need them. The lovely screen, lovefilm streaming and better than average sound don't makes up for these so four stars in my book. Good price though... ...which is more than I can say for the standard case (which is a case not a stand unlike those sold by other high end tablet makers).
customer_reviews.author: musicgadgetfan

customer_reviews.title: beleive the hype people :)
customer_reviews.text: this is my first tablet and i am very happy with my purchase,the kindlefire 8'9 hd does exactly what i need from a tablet.great hd screen is great for movies games ect...other more expensive tablets have more apps ect..but for me the kindle cannot be matched,if you read a lot of books even better,cannot recommend this enough :)
customer_reviews.author: J.

customer_reviews.title: lovely tablet
customer_reviews.text: I already have a kindle fire hd but felt I could do with the 8.9" version with a view to watching films and tv. I love this tablet. It's easy to use and watching films etc is a joy. It's light, streamlined and the sound quality is excellent. I"m v err y glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: fi

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant!
customer_reviews.text: Never far from my hand since I bought it. Loads of room to download all of my books and favourite movies. Automatically transferred all of my books from my previous early model Kindle. Amazing detail and graphics. As good if not as equal to my sons i pad for what I need and still get the internet!
customer_reviews.author: jeepjohn

customer_reviews.title: NOT WORKING
customer_reviews.text: ORDER NO: 205-2309503-5726755 DATE OF ORDER: 11/03/14 As of the date & time of this email, my kindle WILL NOT SWITCH ON at all. It has an almost fully charged battery, but is completely dead. I was quite happy with it to begin with, but as I have had it for a while & it holds some personal information, I am reluctant to return it by post. HELP????
customer_reviews.author: lynward

customer_reviews.title: Hot hot hot
customer_reviews.text: Wow what a great tablet. So glad that I chose this one. Great picture quality. Fantastic books from Amazon at cheap prices to download. I have not used my laptop since buying this 8.9 HD fire tablet. Very happy.Five star quality.
customer_reviews.author: Rumplestiltskin

customer_reviews.title: Read on
customer_reviews.text: My previous Kindle was good but as for reading when partially sighted it is superb as this can be read in vertical or horizontal , and as I need to read with large words in the horizontal I can read much better. Super delivery cannot fault it at all
customer_reviews.author: tommo

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I bough it for boy age 7 and i have made his birthday day. He like to read books and play games on it. He also reads books from it for his small sister and they have a great fun with creating things. He also uses internet on it to get more informations about the things that interest him.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy

customer_reviews.title: Somewhat disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately this product was not as expected. I interpreted the camera "facing front" as being pointing on the opposite side to the screen. This is a logical interpretation or the product description. All I can do with the camera is skype which I don't do and take self portraits - at age 76 this is not a nice thing to do! This was a disappointment. Apart from this the HD Fire 9.9 works fine but it is not as described. I am thinking of returning it but perhaps there is a solution.
customer_reviews.author: Mr P M

customer_reviews.title: Kindle Fire HD 8.9
customer_reviews.text: I decided for the 8.9 version and I can tell you that this was the right decision. I am very happy with it!!! I was so impressed when I received the Kindle that all my previous old purchases were on the new one and no additional messy setup was required. Really happy, everything works as it should and no issues at all.
customer_reviews.author: Branko Ilic

customer_reviews.title: The controlling HD fire
customer_reviews.text: I find this device too controlling, you have to use their browser, which is rubbish in comparison to chrome, with a bit of fiddling though I managed to get it on to my device, I bought it to replace my kindle touch and be able to use the internet, but the kindle touch is better for reading. If you do buy this device, DON'T BUY IT WITH SPECIAL OFFERS, as you will be bombarded with adverts, which just appear on your home screen !! and it costs £10 to have them removed
customer_reviews.author: Phillip Smith

customer_reviews.title: kindle fire hd 8.9"
customer_reviews.text: brought this as a e book reader. it does the job brilliantly with ez reader for pdf format. only thing missing you have to buy a charger if you do not have a mini usb phone charger if you do then your sorted. either way a nice looking tablet and very easy to use and reading is so clear with its hd screen.
customer_reviews.author: Rodney

customer_reviews.title: Quality is excellent.
customer_reviews.text: Super screen and very user friendly ...but a little heavy
customer_reviews.author: CM CLARK-STEEL

customer_reviews.title: My Kindle Fire HD
customer_reviews.text: I am pleased with my Kindle Fire and look forward to experimenting more when I have time. However I am disappointed with the battery life as I find I have to recharge it approximately every 4-5 hours. Also I would like to know how to take photos as all I can take are 'selfies'
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Jennifer Brook

customer_reviews.title: My First Tablet
customer_reviews.text: Love it because it is easy to use, lightweight, has a superb screen for watching HD films and good for reading newspapers and books. The main downside is that many useful android apps such as RBS banking, B T WiFi etc are not available for the kindle. If you want a tablet for mainly watching films, the kindle is excellent but the Google Nexus 7 is more versatile.
customer_reviews.author: Kay Whiley

customer_reviews.title: dissapointed
customer_reviews.text: It's getting blocked all the time so I have to restart it several times, when I use skype on it,it makes a funny noise and then shuts down...the best way to use it is to read books on it...as a tablet I don't recommend it, buy a Samsung or an I-pad instead.
customer_reviews.author: KINGA MOLITORISZ

customer_reviews.title: Ok but...
customer_reviews.text: Ok but you are quiet restricted to what Amazon will let you put on it. Seeing as it's an android tab I thought I'd be able to put pretty much anything in it but due to Amazon and for instance itv not being buddies can't put itv player on as well as some games etc.
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte Sawers

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: I've always preferred a 'proper book' so took a risk spending this sort of money, but I am very happy with it, it's very easy to use. I'm still dipping between this and paperbacks. Not very good in the sunlight though.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Dawn Finch

customer_reviews.title: Kindle Fire HD
customer_reviews.text: So far so good am not an expert yet but have high hopes and very much like being able to make the print larger as my sight isn't very good. Vision is exceptionally good on the screen. l Haven't yet learned how to listen to anything yet. Pity it didn't come with a charger, case and stand because it certainly is much improved with these essential items. You shouldn't send it out without them!
customer_reviews.author: MRS S M ELLIS

customer_reviews.title: Excellent screen size and display
customer_reviews.text: I previously had a Kindle Fire (not HD) and was very pleased with it for reading, surfing the net and convenience of size, but due to deteriorating eyesight (nothing to do with the Kindle) I upgraded to this larger screen HD version and am very pleased with it as well.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Graham

customer_reviews.title: Learning to love
customer_reviews.text: Like all new (to me) technology it takes me a while to fully explore its functionality and learn what it can really do. Only had it a few days and it does everything I need it to but I am sure it can do more. Wish it came with a wall charger though and you didn't have to buy one in addition to.
customer_reviews.author: milliemoo

customer_reviews.title: Kindle fire HD
customer_reviews.text: I have to say this upgrade is really good however, I am unable to use it for clips of Vidio that family members send me of Thier children and pets, as IT WON'T UPLOAD FLASH other than that, it fits the bill for me .
customer_reviews.author: PatriciaD

customer_reviews.title: fantastic for many things ..
customer_reviews.text: I love my kindle fire, it is great for reading, gaming, watching programs , social net working and many more apps. The screen is clear with fantastic colours. Only down side is screen can be difficult to see when sitting out doors when sunny.
customer_reviews.author: Donna from London

customer_reviews.title: great price
customer_reviews.text: I gave 4 stars because I'd taken advantage of the love film offer , so a bargain for the 8.9 model . Otherwise I would have rated lower because of the Kindles limitations ie customising and lack of popular apps on Amazon market . Can't compete with my Nexus 7 .
customer_reviews.author: Gee Pee

customer_reviews.title: always wanted one.
customer_reviews.text: my grandson gave me this for my 62 Birthday. i am still learning about it and what i can do, as i didn't get a booklet which tells you what to do or tutorial. hopefully ill find something in amazon that will tell me. but it arrived as promised by monday, and it was up and running in a couple of hours after charging up. well pleased. Brenda miskin
customer_reviews.author: acorn

customer_reviews.title: Epic!!!
customer_reviews.text: The kindle Fire HD is epic and I love it! It is lightweight and easy to use. I definitely recommend this product for anyone. I'm 11 and I surf the web and play games, listen to music and read books. The only disadvantage is that the battery goes flat in 1 day if you play it a lot. I got it for Christmas and its a really good item. If you don't have the kindle powerfast an iPad/iPhone charger will do. Excellent product!
customer_reviews.author: lulu

customer_reviews.title: Apps not available
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a present for my wife. The system looks nice however there are a few very basic things you are unable to do (personalise your wallpaper for one). The most irritating thing is the unavailability of some very popular apps, itv player, 4 on demand, plus you cannot download anything from the google App Store. If you mail the customer helpline you get a very prompt and polite reply to say thanks for the feedback they will pass it on but sorry the apps are not available. I don't normally write reviews but if I'd have known this I wouldn't have purchased.
customer_reviews.author: RG

customer_reviews.title: kindle fire hd
customer_reviews.text: What a brilliant tablet I was very impressed when it came, I really wanted a iPad but the price was an issue for me so I saw this and it was on offer, it has everything I need and much more .
customer_reviews.author: rubyreay

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE MY KINDLE FIRE
customer_reviews.text: Totally taken with this brilliant kindle. I already own a smaller kindle touch, but wanted the convenience of everything under one roof so to speak. It has not disappointed and I love every minute I use it. Highly Rec to all
customer_reviews.author: Bronwen Cook

customer_reviews.title: What a shame
customer_reviews.text: That the battery started to fail to recharge shortly after purchase. Very upsetting as this was my means of keeping in touch while I was travelling, and also my mode of reading, viewing films etc too. It worked beautifully and easily for a short time. Customer service was very good and sorted out a refund after suggesting ways to fix it.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant screen resolution.
customer_reviews.text: I like this a lot, apart from being unable to enter events in the calendar for some reason. Screen is sharp, bright and clear, even better than the 7" version, which was good. Apps a bit limited, but I seem to be able to get most of what I want.
customer_reviews.author: Colin Macrae

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic piece of hardware... !!
customer_reviews.text: Chose this item on recommendations from friends and truly...it is amazing. Easy to set up, easy to use, great reception with the wi-fi systems. Would highly recommend this Kindle to anyone wanting to read, surf the net, play games and take it on holiday.
customer_reviews.author: Tessa

product_meta.title: Test product - Not for retail sale
